column14: error | clone nodes with their labels and properties (optionally skipping any properties in the skipProperties list via the config map)
column15: and clone the given relationships (will exist between cloned nodes only). If no relationships are provided
column16: all relationships between the given nodes will be cloned. Relationships can be optionally redirected according to standinNodes node pairings (this is a list of list-pairs of nodes)
column17: so given a node in the original subgraph (first of the pair)
column18: an existing node (second of the pair) can act as a standin for it within the cloned subgraph. Cloned relationships will be redirected to the standin.
